content.rendered:
No more struggling to retrieve your gear from the rack, an easy sliding mechanism brings your gear to you. Increased safety and ease of loading and unloading.

RSI SMART RACK

  • Aluminium Construction
  • Improved Access To Gear

 

Designed for RSI canopies

 

Amarok

Dimensions:

1300mm  x 1300mm x 90 mm

Ranger / Hilux / D-Max / Bt-50

Dimensions:

1300mm  x 1350mm x 90 mm

USA Trucks

Dimensions:

1500mm  x 1400mm x 90 mm

 

Click here to view the entire range of RSI SmartCap Evo Canopies available!

Follow us on Instagram and Facebook to keep up to date with what’s going on in our workshop!

 

Please note: Depending on stock & availability, the current wait time for this product is approx. 30 – 90 days from date of order.
